channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 09:31 Return the threat of artebors to Pokrovsk Territorial Community. Salt for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 09:31 Return the threat of artebors to Pokrovsk Territorial Community. Salt for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 09:10 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
